name: A Bottle's Journey
description:
1970, somewhere by the Baltic Sea. A plastic bottle was left on the beach after a small family picnic. Do you know what will happen next?

A Bottle’s Journey is a single-player adventure game about marine pollution. Play as Joe, a joyful plastic bottle, who wants to find the plastics’ Paradise - the North Atlantic Garbage Patch where he will enjoy a cloudless life in the company of other bottles. 

Dynamic gameplay

Embark on the century long journey to help Joe reach his destination. Face multiple challenges awaiting plastic trash in the oceans: hungry fish, poisonous e-waste and old nets. Staying afloat won’t be an easy task!

Facts about marine pollution

Learn about the current situation in the Baltic Sea by exploring the underwater world. Get to know social initiatives dealing with the Baltic Sea pollution and find out what you can do to help save marine life today. 

Unique design

Navigate atmospheric hand-painted environments where everything, even a plastic bag, has its own personality. Enjoy a unique watercolor aesthetic and experience gradual changes caused by plastic pollution through elaborated visual and audio design.
